_header: Of eleven thousand virgins in fere
Note: For the version in the South English Legendary, see 721.
_description: Osbern Bokenham, Legend of the 11,000 Virgins — rhyme royal

BLAru327.First Lines:
Off elleuyn thousand uyrgyns infeerWho so be steryd wyth
                    deuocyoun…
BLAru327.Last Lines:
…In deedly syn purchase hem graceOf uerrey repentaunce or
                    þei hens pace
BLAru327.Attributed Author:
Translated into englys be a doctor of dyuyinte clepyd Osbern Bokenam
                    (index, f. 193) Wrytyn in Cambryge by hys sonn ffrer Thomas Burgh (index, f.
                    193)
BLAru327.Attributed Title:
Her begynnyth þe lyf of þe elleuyn thousend uirgins (rubric, f.
                    58) The lyf of þe Elleuyn thowsend uirgins (index, f. 193)
